pages.text: Kilgobnet is a pirate ship with 12 cannons. (It is the first ship I designed as a structure, and it has been used as a base for most of the other pirate ships.)
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/salvo)$(l)Burst Fire/$$(br)Kilgobnet targets a $(l)line of 3 tiles, damaging all of them/$. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)5 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/counterfire)$(l)Counter Fire/$$(br)$(l)Upon being hit/$, Kilgobnet will $(l)fire at 3 random opponent tiles/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
